Comment: Reverse Sicilian is one I enjoy as it can play mind games for black and gives different options to white with the extra tempo.
Reverse Sicilian is one I enjoy as it can play mind games for black and gives different options to white with the extra tempo.

Funny thing is that I immediately try to remove the imbalance of the Sicilian style opening. Removing imbalance as in trying to disrupt opposite dominant sides of the board per player. I see the Sicilian as having good chances for both players.
